title: Carlyle, Mizuho, Premji Invest aim for KKR-owned Avendus
description: Carlyle, Premji Invest, and Mizuho are vying to acquire a controlling stake in Avendus Capital from KKR. The investment bank, valued at Rs 5,500-6,000 crore, is known for its strong presence in M&As and public market transactions. Final offers are expected soon.
